Package net.sf.michaelo.tomcat.realm

Class ActiveDirectoryRealmBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleBase
      • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleMBeanBase
        • org.apache.catalina.realm.RealmBase
          • net.sf.michaelo.tomcat.realm.ActiveDirectoryRealmBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MBeanRegistration, Contained, JmxEnabled, Lifecycle, Realm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveDirectoryRealm
    public abstract class ActiveDirectoryRealmBase
extends RealmBase
    Base realm which is able to retrieve principals from GSS names, fully established GSS contexts or TLS client certificates.
